solution_line_template: If they agreed to give the winner twice as much money as Braden had in his money box, after winning the bet, Braden received {multiplier_for_winner}*${braden_initial_money}=${<<{multiplier_for_winner}*{braden_initial_money}={braden_received_from_bet}>>}{braden_received_from_bet}

Braden increased the total amount of money in his money box to ${braden_received_from_bet}+${braden_initial_money} = ${<<{braden_received_from_bet}+{braden_initial_money}={total_money_after_bet}>>}{total_money_after_bet}
